name: Berlin no Kabe
overview: Berlin no Kabe is the Game Gear version of the arcade game The Berlinwall. While the gameplay mechanics are identical, there are some significant changes. Foremost, the game adds a story: the player takes the role of a boy who searches for his mother who wanted to visit a neighbor town. Unfortunately, the only thing he finds is a huge wall. When trying to sneak through a hole, he is transported to a strange, hostile place... While some levels are based on the arcade version, others are different. This version also adds a shop where the player can buy power-ups.
